EmailTemplate.name: Dreamforce 2012
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet BATS Improv at Dreamforce 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
iMeet® at DreamForce 2012
During Dreamforce 2012, meet BATS Improv, San Francisco’s premiere Comedy troupe. Place: iMeet® Lounge (Meeting room A5 in Moscone Center Hall E).
Get all of the details: http://go.imeet.com/dreamforce
Talk to them LIVE. Try to OUTWIT them. HECKLE them. Hey! Maybe you’ll be discovered!
Use a little sweet talk and they’ll even explain how you can get a free $10 Starbucks® gift card.
Stage fright? Visit us at Booth #138. Get a demo and enter an INSTANT drawing for a free iPad.
iMeet®: Reinventing The Meeting iMeet® is perfect for video conferences, web meetings and conference calls—whether you’re hosting meetings from your desk, your mobile device, or even at DREAMFORCE 2012 on a 60 inch screen! It’s all in HD video. Secure. And with crystal-clear audio.
Come discover the comedy and productivity that is iMeet at Dreamforce 2012. Let me know if you think you’ll stop by.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
